item.title: Adding points.. doesnt save in character?
item.dc:creator: @poutine8775 poutine8775
item.description:
@poutine8775 wrote:

there no assault = 0 in my character file… I followed a tut and no errors, added everything

		characterfile.write("assault = ", 0, 16);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.assault), 0, Integer.toString(p.assault).length());
		characterfile.newLine();

But i was wondering, What’s the number 16 in my code? i tried 13 and 18, also 24 and doesnt show in my character file
